title: The Re-Deadening
description: As the prophecy foretold, something truly evil has awoken.
quote: What is that Baby Button Eyes? You want me to kill mummy?
altHero: a woman looks scared in a dark hallway as a spooky hand reaches out to grab her
alt1: a young girl sits alone in a rocking chair in a dark room, only illuminated by the moonlight through a window
alt2: the girl holds a rag doll with button eyes
alt3: the rag doll is alive and walking toward an unsuspecting gardener trimming bushes
alt4: the gardener is dead and has buttons sewn on his eyes
